scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch .nojekyll && touch CNAME && echo "solareenlo.com" >> CNAME && mv out/* ../ && rm -fr out && git commit -am 'Deploy Next.js' && git push
scripts.deploy-gh-pages: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && touch out/CNAME && echo "solareenlo.com" >> out/CNAME && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
